description: Mini version of Kånken No. 2 in G-1000 HeavyDuty Eco with leather details. Long shoulder straps that can be adjusted to fit both little and big backs. Perfect for a change of clothes at pre-school – or as a small everyday backpack. 65% recycled polyester, 35% organic cotton. Durable, waxed G-1000 HeavyDuty Eco. Long webbing shoulder straps. Main compartment with large zippered opening. Front pocket with zipper. Two open side pockets. Seat pad in G-1000 HeavyDuty Eco. Seat pad stops contents from pressing against the back. Handles and details in leather. Metal D-ring. Address tag in main compartment. Fits both children and adults. Impregnated with Greenland Wax.
name: Kanken No. 2 Mini
